name: Campeones
storyline: Marco Montes is the second coach of a basketball team of the ACB. Marco is not going through a good time because he has become arrogant and bad mannered. He goes through numerous professional and personal problems and after his dismissal as coach of his team, Marco in a drunken state suffers a traffic accident that carries a serious fine. Marco must choose between 2 years in jail or 90 days of community service training a basketball team called
composed of athletes with various disabilities. At first, the news will not be well accepted by the protagonist but over time, will realize all that is left to learn from these people.
